Perpeptor:

The male, Pulled a semi destroyed maxi-pod that it was in stora=
ge but it would be enough to give at Reclusa a new beast form and pass her =
as a new maximal and left it close the tank with the drone.

"The beast for=
m will be radmon"replied Perceptor"an tha will be the best... every tech pr=
oblem with this beast form  can give ya an excuse to visit CR-rooms... Read=
y to pay a visit to MAxis? and I suggest ya to choose a less predaconish na=
me... "
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Dark Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@ya=
hoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, May 16, 2005 10:55 PM
  Subject: Re: Reclusa=




  Reclusa::

  She didn't like being called little one, but she smiled =
at him because
  she did relish in his ideas. "Ah, very well then. Proceed.=
"  She laid
  down on the table.  "One last thing. Once I am in the other b=
ot,
  you'll need to place my form in the pod and put me out so they may
  =
find me."  She smiled, then frowned. She didn't like having to do
  this, b=
ut her revenge seemed to demand it. "Uh, just what will I look
  like when =
I finally wake up and what form will I transform into? I
  want to be a lit=
tle familiar with what I'll be so I don't give myself
  away from the start=
." The cold table gave it's last bit a reasurance
  to her before she would=
 start her next adventure.
